Module no.ntnu.idatt1002
Package no.ntnu.idatt1002.dao.sqlite

Class SqlSettlementDAO

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1002.dao.sqlite.SqlDAO
no.ntnu.idatt1002.dao.sqlite.SqlSettlementDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<Settlement,Long>, SettlementDAO
public final class SqlSettlementDAO extends SqlDAO implements SettlementDAO
This class is an implementation of the SettlementDAO interface, using SQLite as the underlying data source.
